text.config.chattools.title: Config Chat Tools
key.chattools.requireRestart: Restart the game after editing to apply.
key.chattools.conflictTooltip:
§cThis feature conflicts with §e%s§c and is automatically disabled.
Please change it in the corresponding mod.§r
text.config.chattools.option.displayChat:
Please use "&" for color code prefix, and "\&" for "&".
Statements:
§o{hour}§r refers to current hour value.
§o{minute}§r refers to current minute value.
§o{second}§r refers to current second value.
text.config.chattools.option.nickHiderSe: Please use "&" for color code prefix, and "\&" for "&".
§6* Might not work in some servers.
text.config.chattools.option.matchSelfNa:
For example, if your nickname is Foo, 
then messages containing Foo will be matched.
text.config.chattools.option.toastNotify:
§6* EXPERIMENTAL§r
When Minecraft is running §6in the background (not focused)§r, you will be alerted 
with a Toast Notification when you receive a concern message.

All modes are considered for Windows only.
§6POWERSHELL§r: Triggering pop-ups via Powershell.

§6AWT§r: Triggering pop-ups by Java AWT components.
(Not always useful however, since 
`java.awt.headless == true` in Minecraft
runtime environment)
text.config.chattools.option.highlightSe:
Please use "&" for color code prefix, and "\&" for "&".
 
- Enforce Overwriting:
Enabling this feature will make the text that was interactive non-interactive, 
but allows you to apply custom color codes in the custom prefix; 
Disabling this feature will prevent you from applying custom color codes 
in the custom prefix for the prefix that follows it, but the interactivity 
of the text will remain unchanged.
Please use "&" for color code prefix, and "\&" for "&".

Enabling this feature will make the text that was interactive non-interactive, 
but allows you to apply custom color codes in the custom prefix; 
Disabling this feature will prevent you from applying custom color 
codes in the custom prefix for the prefix that follows it, but the interactivity 
of the text will remain unchanged.
key.chattools.toast.title: Message from Minecraft:
text.config.chattools.option.allowList.@:
Will match following inputs.
RegEx is supported.
text.config.chattools.option.banList.@To:
Will not match following inputs.
RegEx is supported.
text.config.chattools.option.injectorEna: Chat Formatter allows you to automatically add prefixes, suffixes, etc.
text.config.chattools.option.injectorLis:
Apply different formatter rules on different servers.
The more preceding content has higher priority.
Your text will be modified when and only when
§othe address of the server is matched§r and §othe chat§r
§ocontent is not in the "Auto-Disable List"§r
text.config.chattools.option.injectorAdd:
Modify your text when the current
server address matches this field.
RegEx is supported.
You can use §o*§r for arbitrary content.
text.config.chattools.option.injectorStr:
Please use "&" for color code prefix, and "\&" for "&".
Statements:
§o{text}§r refers to your text.
§o{pos}§r refers to your position.
text.config.chattools.option.macroChatMo:
§6LAZY§r: F3 + the corresponding key will NOT
trigger the command.
If a modifier combination is pressed
without setting a modifier, it will not trigger.

§6GREEDY§r: Pressing a modifier combination without
setting a modifier will also trigger the command.
Note that this may cause the F3 combination
to trigger by mistake.
text.config.chattools.option.chatBubbles:
Apply different bubble rules on different servers.
The more preceding content has higher priority.

Apply the rule when the current
server address matches this field.
RegEx is supported.
You can use §o*§r for arbitrary content.

RegEx is supported.
Use group §o<name>§r to match player name.
Use group §o<message>§r to match chat context.

If the message contains a player name,
render the message anyway above the player,
even if the messages doesn't match the rule.
(Note that in this case the message will not be modified.)
